metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000247 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
mpg123 memory overread It was discovered that mpg123 incorrectly handled certain media files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1000247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmpg123-0 - 1.22.4-1ubuntu0.1
mpg123 - 1.22.4-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mpg123 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.22.4-1ubuntu0.1').
